content: 3 more times slip_stitch into the first double_crochet of the round and fasten_off join your squares using the black yarn either by pressing the squares wrong sides together and making sl sts into the back loops or by your preferred join note i recommend using a slightly larger hook 4 mm if you use sl sts the border border round using the black yarn * make a 2hdc ch1 2hdc in any of the corners make 1 half_double_crochet in each of the sts and corner joins across the edge of the blanket up to the next corner * repeat between * * 3 more times slip_stitch into the first half_double_crochet and fasten_off repeat border round for each color in your preferred order the blanket in the picture used pink purple lilac blue mint green yellow orange then red weave in any ends block your blanket and enjoy your new blanket 7
